comment: Amy is great. Just do the modules and pay attention.

Great professor and great class. I took this online, but it was excellent information. You have to stay ahead or else everything will be due at once on one day, online class. Professor is great with responding to emails and lenient. Take this class online. But be prepared to spend a required $80 on the online book.

She is such a sweet lady. The lectures are boring & attendance is not mandatory, but I do recommend going because she will give out the test answers in class & that saves work on your end when it comes time for the midterm and final. She works with you if you miss assignments online, you just have to communicate with her!! Such a caring professor.

Go to class on activity days and do the home work online and you will pass easily. Gives opportunities for extra credit but you don't really need it. two tests both online and a few small group projects.
This class is an easy A! Be sure to attend activity days and pay attention to the homework on the online book.
First of all, Amy is awesome! And secondly, be sure go to class on activity days, because if you dont, you'll end up like me, with a B.

She's great!! Probably one of the easiest profs you'll take. There are a few group projects and attendance really isnt important as long as you come in for activity days. If you do miss an activity there is extra credit you can do! Just do the modules and come in for activities and you will be perfectly fine.
Very clear and willing to help. Go to class, do the assignments, you will do well.

Amy knows this is a required class and not everyone wants to be there. Extra credit was given at random times during the semester. Didn't take notes, All tests are online. Power points are posted on d2l. Used an e-book only to get the labs out of it. I suggest going in half with a friend and making copies of the labs out of the book! Very helpful!
SUPER EASY.. I went to maybe 5 classes the whole semester. all work is due on 3 separate days, the tests are all online and she drops the lowest test grade.
This is the EASIEST class I have ever taken. Just do the labs, tests are online, and you don't have to take the final if you're satisfied with your grade. TAKE HER.

Must take! Super easy class, must get the textbook or e book to complete labs. 4 test, but drops the lowest grade. Makes a potentially boring class a lot of fun and truly cares about what she teaches.

She truly cares about her students and the subject. She realizes that most people only take this class because it's required though, so she doesn't make it too hard. Maymester - several labs from the book, couple of easy projects, and one open-note final. She also gave an extra credit assignment, although you really shouldn't need it. Take her.
Take this class. She is an amazing teacher. Very helpful and genuinely wants you to succeed. She makes a potentially boring class fun.

Shes awesome! Easiest A ever. Test reviews are given the class before the test and she gives you the word for word answers. To make an A go to test review days, test days, and days with in class activities. If you do good on all the test you dont have to take the final because she drops the lowest test.
Easy A. She's understanding and tries to help if you need it. You won't.

Great teacher and easy A. Just go to class and you will receive all the points you need. Usually lets class out early. Take her!!! She is very lenient when it comes to turning in work also. Gives a study guide before each test, study it, and you will make an A.
Class is actually cool and not mandatory attendance. She's cool teacher.

I dreaded taking this class because it is a mandatory class for college, but it ended up being one of my favorite classes. She is funny and laid back. She knows that most of us have harder classes, so she makes this one extremely easy. She'll have conversations with you and she's a funny person. Please take her if you can!!
Turned out to be a great class. Test are not so bad if you go to class and the review. I learned a lot and have made a few changes.

Wonderful teacher; very friendly and entertaining. She made the class bearable and I actually learned something! You will not regret this class. Also, attend the review sessions, because they are a big help and can actually be quite fun.
Very easy class! She is very helpful!

BEST PROFESSOR I'VE TAKEN SO FAR AT KSU... She taught her class with Dav... They are the coolest Professors at KSU. I made 1 B and 2 C on the test and still made an A. It is truely and easy class, and I learned something.. TAKE HER YOU WILL NOT REGERT IT....

I LOVE Mrs. Aenchbacher! She is SOOOO sweet. She has this goofy smile she gets and always tells jokes. She relates everything to a college students life. She's very understanding if you're sick and miss class and is always there to help! TAKE HER!
the best teacher i have had in KSU if your grade is high you can skip the final tons of extra credit to help you get an easy A. Just take her she is very sweeeeet

TAKE HER-three test not to hard =) tons of extra credit very nice and helpful and caring, you are guaranteed a A+ out of this class do all the extra credit and come to class, to review for the test, you get 10 bonus points if you stay for test review ,great class! easy A
Great teacher, very helpful.  Really nice personality.
This class was a freaking breeze. The tests are simple as long as you study the powerpoints. The final was open book. She's awesome to talk to and very approachable.
Great teacher! She is very nice, and she will do anything she can to help you succeed in the class.
awesome teacher. she is good to look at. helps alot with assignments

Loved her! Easy class if you stay on top of assignments. You HAVE to purchase the book that comes with E-Book, but she hates it as much as the students do. She makes sure everyone make the best grade possible...TAKE HER :)
usually entertaining, she wont require you to attend if you know the material
She is super sweet and very approachable if you need any help! I learned a lot in her class! Take her if you can!

It's impossible to not like this professor. She really cares about her students and she does everything she can to help you do well in her class. There is a lot of busy work in her class, but she's always there and very approachable if you have any questions. She does everything she can to make her class fun. She's awesome--take her if you can!

She makes it clear from day one come to class, pay attention, do the labs, come to the review and you will do well. I got behind in the beginning and got a B(I did not listen) There are  A LOT of small assignment that you have to stay on top of. She is approachable and helpful. She does believe in what she does. Even I learned a few things.

She was great! I took her because some of my friends recommended her.  She actually claims to be an easy A, but I still learned a lot from her class!  She's a very kind person and is extremely healthy.

Lots of busy work in this class but none of it is too tough.  As she lectures she makes sure that you know which information is important.  She doesn't have a very animated teaching style, but the class is interesting and informative.
Great person. She makes you believe you CAN make positive changes in your life. I am healthier and more knowledgeable having taken this class with Amy.  She practices what she teaches and it shows
Very helpful. The course work was hard but reasonable
Go grab an A & be happy! Review is basically what's gonna be on the test. Attendance & activites days r kinda mandatory but they are your keys to an A. U can never go wrong!
Does take roll. Do your work and you will do well in her class. Read powerpoint notes that she provides---Not necessarily book. Labs and projects are easy.
Great teacher. HPS is mandatory, so make sure you take this class with her.

She is great! there are 10 labs - the easiest 100 points, then micro fit test - 10 point just for doing it, 3 tests (she gives a study guide that follows the test completely).She is very-very helpful and extremely nice. Take her and you actually can learn something.

Amy was by far the best teacher I have had at Kennesaw. She is kind, extremely helpful and tries to make her class fun. As long as you do all the assignments and study for the tests you should get an A.

She is the perfect example of what the other HPS teachers should be...and look :-) you can tell by her look that she applies what she teach :-) very interactive class, you learn a lot and will have a lot of fun...big A if you come to all the classes.

Best Teacher Ever! Mrs. Aenchbacher is the best HPS teacher hands down. She makes the material interesting, does hands on activites and is probably one of the kindest people I have ever met. She does test reviews that make the departmental tests easy and she truely wants he students to excel. GREAT TEACHER!
Super easy class...she just reads frm slides that are on WebCT.  We really only used books for the labs, which are easy.  She gives answers frm the test.  She's really nice too.

she is really nice teacher and very helpful. she is willing to help you in everyway and you have to do all the work to get A (mostley bz work but very easy) the study guide is almost the same as test and take her if she is avalible!!!!
She is the best - great experience!
She is so sweet and helpful. She is actually so sweet that I think a lot of people take advantage of her kindness.

Please TAKE HER CLASS...She is awesome! Fun class... you will learn a lot of good stuffs. Test are easy, she schedule the test so you don't have to to worry about studing for this class during finals. Final test is optional...if you turn in your labs, participate, to your reports and do well in the test you'll get a big A!
Just a little busy work with the labs. Very nice, easy teacher. Always willing to help and allows you to turn labs in late sometimes. Easy tests if u just pay attention to notes online.
Great teacher. Very understanding. Dressed out maybe 3-4 times the whole semester. Labs and test are easy. TAKE HER...you won't regret it.
Excellent class, fun and easy tests, easy labs. Take her class! you'll enjoy and actually learn a lot of good stuff about your physical health.
This class should only be taken if she is your instructor, otherwise you will most likely end up wishing you had chosen her class.
